page.title: 03THE SCHOOL
page.content: At LYDEARD ST LAWRENCE there is a school of 28 children and three teachers.There is also a playgroup and a mother and toddler group. There are three classrooms one for the infants, one for the juniors and one for the playgroup. We have a library opposite the junior class and the little play group is next to the juniors. Leading from the junior class is the kitchen. Next to the library is the heads office, a cupboard and sink unit. We have a school garden with a little pond and shed. Over the garden wall is the swimming pool. The infants are near the pool. We have a field where we do sports and two climbing frames which we play on at break. We also have a long jump the run off is 15 metres 10cm the pit is 5 metres each way.
